DOC.brief_summary: The aim examine whether intranasal oxytocin influence individual ' emotion regulation ability relate neural mechanism .
DOC.detailed_description: In present study , investigator plan conduct between-subject , double-blind , placebo-controlled experiment investigate effect oxytocin neural , physiological behavior activity relate emotion regulation . The emotion regulation ability assess emotional go-nogo task cognitive reappraisal task . The neural activity explore functional magnetic resonance imaging ( fMRI ) . And investigator record participant ' heart rate fMRI investigate effect oxytocin heart rate variability emotion regulation process . All subject complete range questionnaire measure personality affective trait level anxiety self-administration , include Positive Negative Affect Schedule ( PANAS ) , State-Trait Anxiety Inventory ( STAI ) , Beck Depression Inventory ( BDI ) , Cheek Buss shyness Scale ( CBSS ) , Autism Spectrum Quotient ( ASQ ) , Empathy Quotient ( EQ ) , Interpersonal Reactivity Index ( IRI ) , Action Control Scale ( ACS ) , Emotion Regulation Questionnaire ( ERQ ) , Berkley Expressivity Questionnaire ( BEQ ) , .
DOC.criteria: healthy subject without past current psychiatric neurological disorder history head injury ; claustrophobia ; medical psychiatric illness .
